sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Col, Row, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Trash } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../style/Cart.css' import { orderData } from '../data/cartData'; const Cart = () => { const noImagePath = '/img/no_image.svg'; const [orderList, setOrderList] = useState(orderData); return (

Cart

Product
Unit Price
Quantity
Sub-Total
 { orderList.map((item, idx) => (

{item.title}

{item.sku.itemName}

Unit Price {item.sku.discount > 0 ? {`$${item.sku.price}`} : `$${item.sku.price}`}
{item.sku.discount > 0 ? `$${item.sku.price * (100 - item.sku.discount) / 100}` :
} Quantity
{item.amount}
 Amount ${item.sku.price * (100 - item.sku.discount) / 100 * item.amount} )) }

Items:

{orderList.length}

Total Price:

{ orderList.reduce((prevVal, currValue) => ( prevVal + currValue.amount * (currValue.sku.price * (100 - currValue.sku.discount) / 100) ), 0) }

) } export default Cart;
